name: Orc Clans
author: guitarninja#5707
background: The Orc Clans are a band of roving orcs who scrap, fight and die for the glory of it. Their origin is still unknown, but they are spread across the galaxy in wide numbers. Orcs usually gather with a steady amount of goblins who act as the workers and some even pilot goblin mech creations.

warlord.name: Warlord
warlord.description: The clan leader and toughest orc boss.

warlord_bike.name: Warlord on Bike
warlord_bike.description: A tough warboss mounted on a war bike.

shaman.name: Shaman
shaman.description: A strange orc with psychic powers.

shaman_bike.name: Shaman on Bike
shaman_bike.description: A strange orc with psychic powers on a war bike.

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: An orc with a knack for scrapping and fixing things.

mechanic_bike.name: Mechanic on Bike
mechanic_bike.description: An orc with a knack for scrapping and fixing things on a war bike.

mad_doctor.name: Mad Doctor
mad_doctor.description: An orc with a knack for fixing up the wounded.

mad_doctor_bike.name: Mad Doctor on Bike
mad_doctor_bike.description: An orc with a knack for fixing up the wounded on a war bike.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: A lowly goblin used as cannonfodder.

goblin_leader.name: Goblin Leader
goblin_leader.description: A lowly goblin leader used as cannonfodder.

brute.name: Brute
brute.description: A big orc ready to cause maximum havoc.

brute_leader.name: Brute Boss
brute_leader.description: A big orc leader ready to cause maximum havoc.

looter_orc.name: Looter Orc
looter_orc.description: An Orc obsessed with looting and upgrading shooting weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

looter_orc_leader.name: Looter Orc Boss
looter_orc_leader.description: An Orc leader obsessed with looting and upgrading shooting weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

heavy_looter_orc.name: Heavy Looter Orc
heavy_looter_orc.description: An Orc obsessed with looting and upgrading heavy shooting weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

heavy_looter_orc_leader.name: Heavy Looter Orc Boss
heavy_looter_orc_leader.description: An Orc leader obsessed with looting and upgrading heavy shooting weapons. Can be equipped for various specialist roles.

looter_boss.name: Brute Looter
looter_boss.description: A Brute Orc obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons.

looter_boss_leader.name: Brute Looter Boss
looter_boss_leader.description: A Brute Orc leader obsessed with looting and upgrading weapons.

storm_orc.name: Jetpack Orc
storm_orc.description: An angry orc fighter equipped with a jetpack.

storm_orc_leader.name: Jetpack Orc Boss
storm_orc_leader.description: An angry orc leader equipped with a jetpack.

storm_orc_heavy.name: Jetpack Orc Heavy
storm_orc_heavy.description: An angry orc gunner equipped with a jetpack.

ultra_boss.name: Ultra Brute
ultra_boss.description: A Brute Orc that is heavily armored and dangerous.

ultra_boss_leader.name: Ultra Brute Boss
ultra_boss_leader.description: A Brute Orc leader that is heavily armored and dangerous.

attack_beast.name: Attack Beast
attack_beast.description: A bouncing beast with gnashing teeth.

biker.name: Orc Biker
biker.description: An angry orc on a bike.

biker_leader.name: Biker Boss
biker_leader.description: An angry orc leader on a bike.

boss_biker.name: Brute Biker
boss_biker.description: A bigger orc mounted on a bike.

boss_biker_leader.name: Brute Biker Boss
boss_biker_leader.description: A bigger orc leader mounted on a bike.

orc_minicopter.name: Orc Minicopter
orc_minicopter.description: A miniature helicopter for quick and deadly air attacks piloted by an orc.

orc_minicopter_leader.name: Orc Minicopter Boss
orc_minicopter_leader.description: A miniature helicopter for quick and deadly air attacks piloted by an orc leader.

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Pole
speed_pole.description: Friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" add +1" to their Movement characteristic.

orc_tactics.name: Orc Tactics
orc_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Initiative tests of 9+

goblin_assistant.name: Goblin Assistant
goblin_assistant.description: Models in this unit gain +1 to Repair rolls.

energy_field.name: Energy Field
energy_field.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 Save.

force_field.name: Force Field
force_field.description: Roll a die for each hit this model takes, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

war_banner.name: War Banner
war_banner.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Friendly units of X types within 6" may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

relic_killer_claw.name: The Killer Claw
relic_killer_claw.description: Replace one model's Heavy Energy Claw(X) with The Killer Claw(X).
relic_killer_claw.flavor: This Claw is the most killy claw you've ever seen.

speed_pole.name: Big Boss Pole
speed_pole.description: Upgrade one Warlord model with The Big Boss Pole.
speed_pole.flavor: Nearby Orcs are filled with a zeal to charge forward and attack.

legend_energy_field.name: Overcharged Energy Field
legend_energy_field.flavor: This shield generator can be overcharged to bounce back even the strongest attacks for a moment.

teleport.name: Jump Teleport
teleport.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

strength.name: Mighty Strength
strength.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Strength until the end of the round.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 hits with AP(4).

here_we_go.name: Here We Go!
here_we_go.description: Use when a unit declares a _Charge_ action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.

goblin_shield.name: Goblin Shield
goblin_shield.description: Use after an _Infantry_ unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack. For this attack, roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit if there is a friendly _Goblin_ unit within 6" of it. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to the _Goblin_ unit instead of the original target.

smash_them.name: Smash Them
smash_them.flavor: It's about time we got to fighting.
smash_them.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Successful hits generate one additional attack.
